001package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.decorators;
002
003import lombok.Getter;
004import lombok.experimental.Delegate;
005import org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver;
006
007/**
008 * Abstract base class for WebDriver decorators.
009 *
010 * <p>This class allows for extending WebDriver functionality by wrapping an existing WebDriver instance.
011 * It provides a foundation for additional behaviors such as logging, exception handling, or event-driven execution.
012 *
013 * <p>Subclasses should extend this class and implement any additional WebDriver-related features.
014 *
015 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
016 */
017@Getter
018public abstract class WebDriverDecorator implements WebDriver {
019
020   /**
021    * The original WebDriver instance being decorated.
022    */
023   @Delegate
024   protected final WebDriver original;
025
026   /**
027    * Constructs a WebDriverDecorator wrapping an existing WebDriver instance.
028    *
029    * @param original The WebDriver instance to be decorated.
030    */
031   protected WebDriverDecorator(WebDriver original) {
032      this.original = original;
033   }
034}
